quagga.input.subject: Revised Sea Robin Availabilities effective 6/17/00

quagga.input.xto: George Smith, Edward Terry, Tricia Bowen, Victor Lamadrid, Mark L Schrab, Darren Espey, Margie Straight, Charles T Muzzy, Sabra L Dinari, Joe A Casas, Christina Sanchez, Lisa Kinsey, Kirk Lenart, Daren J Farmer, Beverly Beaty
quagga.input.body:
---------------------- Forwarded by Ami Chokshi/Corp/Enron on 06/16/2000 
05:36 PM ---------------------------


"Steve Holmes" <Steve.Holmes@dvn.com> on 06/16/2000 05:10:37 PM
To: <Ami.Chokshi@enron.com>, <Christina.Sanchez@enron.com>
cc:  

Subject: Revised Sea Robin Availabilities effective 6/17/00


Christina,
Per our conversation this afternoon, I have revised the availabilities for 
those meters that have a PVR deduction effective 6/17/00.  I will let you 
know as soon as I hear anything about the Sea Robin plant coming back online.

Steve
